bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with li yang feng 癧瘍風 , pervasion-illness with ulcer wind. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 癧瘍者，人有頸邊、胸前、掖下自然斑剝，點相連，色微白 而圓，亦有烏色者，亦無痛癢，謂之癧瘍風 , “ Pervasion-illness with ulcer : when someone has macules with interconnected dots at the sides of the neck, on the chest, and in the armpits, that appear to have come by themselves, are white and round, occasionally black, and neither itch nor ache, this is called pervasion-illness with ulcer wind”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 : 癧瘍是汗斑，癜風是白斑片，赤者 名赤疵 , “ Pervasion-illness with ulcer manifests itself as sweat macules. Patch wind appears as white macule flakes. Red ones are called red blemishes” .
